articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: LaLiga slam Premier League 'cheating' after clubs spend $1bn - ESPN India
articles.description: LaLiga has hit out at the Premier League for "cheating" and "doping" after clubs spent a record $1 billion in the January transfer window.
articles.content: LaLiga has hit out at the Premier League for "cheating" and "doping" after an analysis from Deloitte's Sports Business Group said clubs spent a record £815 million ($1 billion) in the January transfe… [+2992 chars]

articles.title: Van Niekerk left out of South Africa T20 WC squad | Cricbuzz.com - Cricbuzz - Cricbuzz
articles.description: Sune Luus will captain South Africa in the tournament in Dane van Niekerk's absence
articles.content: All-rounder Dane van Niekerk has been left out of South Africa's squad for the upcoming Women's T20 WC, set to be played in South Africa, for failing to meet the fitness standards. Sune Luus will cap… [+1644 chars]

articles.title: Boris Becker discloses Novak Djokovic's real view on GOAT race vs Rafael Nadal and Federer - Express
articles.description: Boris Becker has had his say on the great debate surrounding Novak Djokovic, Rafael Nadal and Roger Federer.
